---
title: "Anivia: Animal image annotator"
---

**Anivia** is a new web tool  intended specifically for annotation of animal keypoints from images in both 2D and 3D. 

You can find it here: [https://lambdaloop.com/anivia](https://lambdaloop.com/anivia/)

Key features:

- Runs directly in a browser, no installation needed
- Support for DeepLabCut, SLEAP, Lightning Pose, and Anipose formats
- Images are loaded in your browser locally
- For 3D annotation: see reprojection error, project to different viwes, and more!

To get started, try following one of the tutorials for [DeepLabCut (2D)](tutorial_deeplabcut.qmd) or [Anipose (3D)](tutorial_anipose.qmd) annotation datasets. You may also want check the [guides](guides_intro.qmd) for help with a specific workflow.

![](images/index/anivia_screenshot.png){fig-alt="A screenshot of the Anivia interface."}

Anivia is derived from the [VGG Image Annotator](https://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/via/) (Version 2), by Abhishek Dutta, Akush Gupta, Andrew Zisserman and VIA contributors.
